info.title: Fulfillment API
info.description:
- alpha: Currently developed API version. Subject to major changes.
- beta: A semi-stable early access version. New features can be added. Breaking changes are possible.
- stable: The API is recommended for use in production.

[Changelog](https://fulfillment-api.steve.niceshops.com/v1/docs/changelog.html)

All data is transferred in UTF-8 encoding.\
The API uses stateless HTTP. No cookies have to be kept.\
Authentication via OAuth2 client credentials flow.

[Privacy Policy](https://www.niceshops.com/en/dienstleistungen/data-privacy-policy)

[Fulfillment API PHP client @Packagist](https://packagist.org/packages/datenkraft/bb-fulfillment-api-php-client)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page to read. Default is the first page.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum size per page is 100. Default is 100.

parameters.name: paginationMode
parameters.description:
The paginationMode to use:
- default: The total number of items in the collection will not be calculated.
- totalCount: The total number of items in the collection will be calculated.
This can mean loss of performance.

parameters.name: filter[endpoint]
parameters.description: A filter for restricting the audit log to a endpoint.

parameters.name: filter[version]
parameters.description: A filter for restricting the audit log to a endpoint version.

parameters.name: filter[identifier]
parameters.description: A filter for querying actions for a identifier.

length (check maxLength field).

parameters.description: The number the order is referred by.

parameters.description: The shopCode used in DISCO (optional).

400.description:

Unauthorized

Not Found

409.description:
Conflict

Error codes:
- ORDER_NOT_CANCELABLE: The order could not be canceled anymore.
- ORDER_ALREADY_CANCELED: The order is already canceled.
- ORDER_CANCELLATION_ALREADY_EXISTS: An order cancellation request already exists, which needs manual approval.

auditLog.description: Data to represent a audit log entry.

endpoint.description: The name of the audited endpoint.

version.description: The version of the audited endpoint.

confidentialContent.description: The GDPR relevant content of the resource.

requestId.description: The optional request ID of the endpoint call.

oauthClientId.description: The OAuth client id which did the change.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the action. Format in ISO 8601.

auditLogCollection.title: auditLogCollection
auditLogCollection.description: A collection of audit log entries

languageCode.description: The language code for any customer communications (ISO 639-1)

deliveryAddress.description: If not given the invoice address is used for delivery.

page.description: The page contained in this collection.

pageSize.description: The page size used for reading the collection.

totalCount.description:
The total number of items in the collection.\
Note: This can be null depending on the used paginationMode

orderNumber.description: The order number. Note: This can be null if the delivery has no associated order.

status.description:
Status of the delivery.
- delivered: The delivery has been transferred to the delivery agent.

shipments.description: List of shipments (= package, parcel, pallet, ...)

deliveryService.title: deliveryService
deliveryService.description: Data to represent a delivery service

deliveryShipment.description: A shipments defines a single delivered entity (package, parcel, pallet, ...)

status.description:
Status of the delivery.
- delivered: The delivery has been transferred to the delivery agent.

deliveryService.description:
The delivery service used to send this delivery. \
The codes of supported delivery services can be retrieved from the 'GET /delivery-service' endpoint.

link.description: Link to the carrier's tracking site

key.description: The reference to the field causing the error

value.description: The value of the field causing the error

identifiers.description: Contains key value pairs for single identifier

newOrder.title: newOrder
newOrder.description: Data to create a new order

orderNumber.description:
The order number. \
Note: If this number is prefixed with 'NICE', it means that the order was created was created
manually by niceshops.

orderItems.description: Note: canceled orderItems are NOT included.

status.description:
The current status of the order.
- new: The order was created but not every required information was given.
The order can not be processed without manual intervention.
- processing: The order is being processed.
For split deliveries, some of the shipments might have already been transferred to the delivery
agent.
- delivered: The orders shipments have all been transferred to the delivery agent (Note that the
update to this status might be delayed and not yet reflect the status of the linked deliveries).
- deleted: The order has been marked as deleted.
- canceled: The order has been canceled.
- locked: The order is locked. The order can not be processed without manual intervention.
- examination: The order has been manually locked.
The order can not be processed without manual intervention.'

orderDate.description: The create date for the order. Default is the current date. Format in ISO 8601

delivery.description: Note that only deliveries with status 'delivered' are shown in this list.

provinceCode.description:
Mandatory if province codes for country exist
(ISO 3166-2) - https://www.iso.org/iso-3166-country-codes.html \
Note: For addresses in Italy (IT), the province code is optional and will be detected automatically if not
provided.

orderDelivery.title: orderDelivery
orderDelivery.description: The delivery for the order. Details can be read by GET /delivery/.

status.description:
Status of the delivery.
- delivered: The delivery has been transferred to the delivery agent.

count.description: Positive number of items to order

value.description:
The price value rounded to 2 decimals with a dot used as separator. Note: This price value refers to
single unit and is not an aggregated price value, which may be calculated by multiplying this price value by
the corresponding item count.

vat.description: The VAT in percent. Can be null in case of bundle products with mixed VAT percentages.

orderPayment.title: orderPayment
orderPayment.description: Options regarding the payment of the order

orderShipping.title: orderShipping
orderShipping.description: Options regarding the shipping of the order

deliveryService.description:
The delivery service to recommend for usage. \
The codes of supported delivery services can be retrieved from the 'GET /delivery-service' endpoint.

shipmentLine.description: One piece of content in a shipment

count.description: Number of items contained in the delivery

discoOrderReferencePrefix.description: The prefix to the order reference in DISCO.

projectId.description: The id of the project to which the shop belongs.

testShop.description: Flag to mark a shop used for testing.

testShopResetNotBefore.description: Date time to indicate that the test shop will not be reset before this time.

productNumber.description: The product number the stock is available for
